subject: Football (College)
Awards, Decorations and Honors
lead_paragraph: Alabama running back Derrick Henry, Stanford running back Christian McCaffrey and Clemson quarterback Deshaun Watson are the finalists for the award, given to the nation’s best player.
snippet: Alabama running back Derrick Henry, Stanford running back Christian McCaffrey and Clemson quarterback Deshaun Watson are the finalists for the award, given to the nation’s best player.
